title: Instructor Development Course for Improving Online Learning Accessibility and Inclusivity

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience operating online education platforms and intermediate expertise in primary education
context.additional_context: Strengthening Capabilities for Improving Corporate Social Field Educational Content for In-Service Elementary Education Practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design online content that incorporates accessibility requirements (addressing visual/auditory impairments) in accordance with inclusive design principles
Learners establish improvement strategies using self-diagnosis tools for content accessibility based on quality standards (WCAG 2.1)
Learners can evaluate and provide feedback on the accessibility levels of peers' online educational materials through a peer review system
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
